nodes.text: Smarteel was a desert planet in Wild Space.
Smarteel had its share of outlaws who called this planet their home and who dealt in illegal trade.
It was home to the base of Cabrool Nuum, an old associate of Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
The PC game Star Wars: Rebellion mistakenly places Smarteel in the Kanchen sector, which is actually located in the Core Worlds.
